Name: Orange Martini
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A sophisticated, complex balance of orange and gin.
History: Adapted from the Orange Cocktail and Orange Martini Cocktail in in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Orange Martini contains 190 calories
